txt.en: 'My people have stored many provisions for war, [placeholder]. Ha! Listen to me: my people. They are no longer my people! I have not been a Falcon from the very moment Lheu Brenin sold us to the Wizard.\n\n'Your friends helped the Hebog-lûth store many provisions. Take away these goods, and they will be less prepared to fight on behalf of Saruman. Go into the village and steal back some of these provisions!'
'Let us see how well the Falcon-clan wages its war without these goods!'
'Do not allow the Falcon-clan to keep the provisions your friends helped collect! Travel into Tûr Morva and steal back these goods!'
Seren wants you to steal back some of the provisions the Falcon-clan has stored in Tûr Morva.
Provisions for war can be found throughout the village of Tûr Morva.\n\nSeren has asked you to steal provisions back from the Falcon-clan.
Seren is at the forward encampment in Tâl Methedras.
